staff ambiance hotel intimate faded old guard attitude found totally light 21st corporate younger people might find old public rooms appointed mostly period italian furnishings fixtures clear interior worth extra expense

Reviews.Title: “Staff in Need of Training!”

Reviews.Content: wife recently spent four days gritti palace must say truly enjoyable memorable experience believe experience word must stay hotel truly enjoy level service setting room accomodations checking invited see several different rooms able choose one liked service truly outstanding think staff visited room least five times day times day gone request staff friendly gracious sense truly enjoyed close main attractions immediately adjacent water bus services views front deck grand canal spectacular would recommend hotel without reservation anyone looking first class venice experience

Reviews.Title: “Superb hotel, full of history”
Reviews.Author: Thomas_7517
Reviews.Content: friend wished treat going 50th birthday certainly picked fabulous hotel entrance clean check extremely quick beautiful room overlooked canal although rooms seem quite old looked kept style long heavy curtains magnificent murano chandelier spacious bathroom power shower several could almost blow away every detail thought complimentary chocolates left us hotel took upon leave us complimentary bottle room friends birthday lovely touch thing would say mini bar room service expensive unless dont mind paying bowl ice cream restaurant equally expensive although recommended couple great restaurants venice concierge excellent thing one must whilst staying drink bar outside directly water see boats pass hotel also take water taxi decent glass set back around get nuts really london prices overall opinion hotel wonderfully quiet except fact boats deliver canal side early morning noisy otherwise peaceful rooms large elegant staff helpful real treat go somewhere like hotel would definitely go back stayed great hotels one best 10 minute walk st marks square feel touristy

Reviews.Title: “Loved the decor!!”
Reviews.Author: NikkiSoo
Reviews.Content: little complain little praise eg 3 coffees last friday lobby 50 euro smell sewage bad worse hotel outside nice room poor bathroom plastic shower curtain

Reviews.Title: “Gritti Delightful, but Dine elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: travelfashionista
Reviews.Content: stayed birthday travelled venice many times parts hotel lovely rooms need although clean tidy fantastic view seem dated bathrooms poor staff fantastic really friendly helpful polite sure would stay unless refurbished shame service good

Reviews.Title: “the very top”
Reviews.Author: sebastiaan4norfolk
Reviews.Content: gracious concierge paper thin walls stay made difficult sleep night rooms original quite faded decor dated tired seems high time refurbishment considering room rates per night standard room fact starwood hidden rather overly corporate paper amenities toiletries even though costs would original hotel could said sister hotel danieli visited next time likely stay seems better maintained

Reviews.Title: “Faded Glory!”
Reviews.Author: dd-nd
Reviews.Content: worth every euro sitting grand canal watch everyone going water

Reviews.Title: “Pricey, but the most spacious rooms filled with antiques”
Reviews.Author: SBW-Raleigh-NC
Reviews.Content: wonderful great service excellent guest rooms central st marks square everything note venice watch expensive hotel bar food excellent staff willing please restaurant square behind hotel excellent

Reviews.Title: “A Grand old lady”
Reviews.Author: MrsNP712
Reviews.Content: stayed four nights venice wonderful place spend long weekend especially september weather cooler booked suite expecting price euro per night accommodation overlooking canal first room shown view whatsoever apart roof hotel surrounding buildings second room better canal view decor room best described faded elegance bed however clean extremely comfortable bag laundry sat corridor outside room duration stay fruit provided room day one replaced restaurant adjoining bar small staff service slow one two lifts order terrace area front hotel canal pleasant spot lunch ridiculously overpriced location hotel however excellent within comfortable walking distance main shops would go back venice yes would stay gritti

Reviews.Title: “Too hot by far”
Reviews.Author: paulineclifton
Reviews.Content: decided go gritti palace hotel first wedding anniversary weekend overall found good choice arrival though receptionist said going send housekeeper upstairs check everything ok room went onto terrace first drink holiday delicious fruit juice cocktail half hour later room ready although past 3 pm checkin time 2 pm said wait another 25 min apologized saying fully booked staff good enough excuse hotel however seem genuinely asked wanted drink house already one way made us pay end remember late went bite fabulous san quarter couldnt get changed husband suffered terrible wasnt wearing walking shoes way back late afternoon finally shown room booked gran deluxe room think got room price much smaller realized later end forgot ask case hotel fully booked donâ€™t think would able change room anyway room fourth floor view santa maria del anywhere else matter overlooking wall roof think another part hotel hardly sky visible bathroom ok need quite good overall bathtub spacious liked bedroom one side lamps wasnt working enough light didnt mind receptionist accompanied us room pointed nothing done however must say furniture lovely antiques wood green pink created typical venetian atmosphere maybe romantic another room would partly made smallish size room like elegant traditional style like us perfect go looking place also first night turndown service housekeeper came early getting ready dinner told wed gone 830 never came back spite booking first anniversary nothing done us even flower chocolate room unlike always happens certain hotels expecting upgrade anything little touch would appreciated yet apart overall experience good much ready go back dont say easily breakfast terrace fantastic terms food drinks service also attentive internet service given free charge arrange online flight checkin absolutely loved hotel style location also central quiet little wrong details easily recommend hotel romantic experience

Reviews.Title: “Glad we did it, but won't do it again.”
Reviews.Author: Rover4
Reviews.Content: wonderful stay gritti hotel stayed 2 nights wish able stay longer concierge great helpful room beautiful large marble bathroom room service quick makes best coffee

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel”
Reviews.Author: kis777
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights part trip venice third night moment step hotels gritti water taxi grand canal know entering world venetian hotel managed keep authentic feel place though probably due fact main rooms appear state size antiques hotel booked venetian room super deluxe room perhaps little full lovely antique furniture staff went way helpful breakfast indeed restaurant divine world passing grand canal june morning sun delicious array breakfast fare scrambled egg ham die position hotel excellent girlfriend never venice spent day 28 years ago water taxis bit steep got 24 hour ticket water buses one stops almost next door hotel get easily canals hotel main sites easily found foot done quick run around honestly say gritti serious afford gritti give authentic venetian experience could want wasnt hotels bar man makes best town one terrace watching aspects venetian life pass grand canal enough said

Reviews.Title: “If you have a choice do not stay here.”
Reviews.Author: RMG66
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights first trip venice loved hotel loads character arrived private water taxi would well recommend straight door bags collected taken straight rooms room amazing typical style although view window didnt matter really well looked found venice expensive well worth couple days

Reviews.Title: “Love the Hotel Gritti Palace”
Reviews.Author: VenetianLady
Reviews.Content: stayed wife christmas holiday couldnt pleased given hotel read prior visit cant speak reviews thoroughly enjoyed stay partial canal view room spacious well appointed also view couldnt window pros great location spectacular views restaurant outside patio crowded fewer rooms hotels venice find lobby luggage huge tour groups great bar drinks bar almost every night met interesting people many people evening guests hotel tend repeat customers stayed years quite friendly cons deal would improve bathrooms need updated bad dated breakfast par 5 star hotels fine 5 star level finally expensive although venice expensive right given gritti 5 star hotel hardly surprising nothing beyond would typically 5 star hotel great unique place stay leaves feeling left world chain hotels behind

Reviews.Title: “So sad to see an icon slip”
Reviews.Author: edrAlexandria
Reviews.Content: last time stayed gritti palace january nothing short opulent divine visit different story maybe due recent staff shock drop quality service room breakfast room indifferent would kind cold eggs took forever arrive server high tea tired room made stay less hand concierge attentive welcoming hope clean act next time think well stay danieli whose lobby divine place drinks tea like museum

Reviews.Title: “Great service, mediocre room, and very expensive”
Reviews.Author: Keith045
Reviews.Content: wife spent 3 nights long weekend gritti palace overall experience good nice style room roof partial view grand canal superb furniture decoration confortable bed well located hotel near san marco close vaporetto station terrace hotel directly canal contrary starwood hotels venice ex danieli lot tourists passing day friendly staff restaurant superb food wine nice french guy would say nice feeling bought package good value money however prices room breakfast dinner bar etc understand bad feeling guests paid full price bad point concierge friendly also lack information room facilities offered hotel conclusion highly recommended good deal found

Reviews.Title: “High hopes but complete let down...”
Reviews.Author: wanderingstar68
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel gritti palace 2004 enjoyed hotel except fact got stuck hotel room bathroom 2 hours phone bathroom call front desk tell stuck rooms filled beautiful antique furniture including bathroom fixtures liked stay romantic hotel right main canal great breakfast hotel restaurant sit outside great hotel looking feeling italy modern feel

Reviews.Title: “A Dying Legend!”
Reviews.Author: francescaBannerElkNc
Reviews.Content: venice beautiful time year september check architecture hotel fan famous american happened staying well surprise gritti posh crowd international yet remains still small chic classic rooms delightful little jewel boxes beds dream surprised find service bit shabby concierge us table one favourite restaurants sorry wont tell booked booked family restaurant turned italian big us diner us thought realised concierge directions postcards old gritti shame subject clients us us know chose gritti like wonderful places accept nothing less recommend places equal quality know see one world travellers instantly phoned friend phoned friend got us somewhere else delightful sunday gritti terrace decent food charming good wines stay book dinner reservations buon

Reviews.Title: “Nice, but for happy fews only”
Reviews.Author: bjouve
Reviews.Content: best place stay venice staff everything make self little dog feel welcome food expensive worth experience isnt cheap looking palace hotel one

Reviews.Title: “Have a drink don't stay”
Reviews.Author: MQS007
Reviews.Content: travelled 1 month france italy places went high end spectacular one best trips ever disappointment gritti matter expensive disappointment room small bathroom real disappointment im going pay euros night expect little room bathroom leave toothbrush honestly one worst hotel experience whether rooms price major disappointment mention crazy prices originally booked changed went see hotel almost started gorgeous place favor stay away gritti unless want get

Reviews.Title: “Not exactly a palace”
Reviews.Author: PaLovetotravel
Reviews.Content: gritti palace right canal st marks square great location rooms spacious like suites filled lovely antiques beautiful bath complaint overpriced food

Reviews.Title: “That was amazing!”
Reviews.Author: Gemmadimare
Reviews.Content: spent 2 nights gritti palace prior 6 nights lake could fault yes old building couldnt really find anything complain decor wise staff pleasant helpful without exception didnt carry bag throughout stay hotels room back lovely room little balcony overlooking grand canal absolutely perfect bathroom huge range complimentary items returned room first night bottle champagne large bowl delicious started ended day balcony watching venice go dined terrace last night lovely meal expected little weve never photo taken whilst eating choose dine terrace famous hotel expect sort interest assume actually hotel got way hotel short stroll fantastic designer shops st marks square still feels quiet way managed stroll beaten track well away may holiday tourists saw real venice fantastic plenty places eat wide range prices sad didnt time try little restaurants tucked away many side streets overall loved venice certainly return

Reviews.Title: “Great, but..”
Reviews.Author: winebuyer
Reviews.Content: thought stay gritti palace good nice big room views canal loud night opposed hotels main square service good nice store premises rent fun overall enjoyed stay gritti palace
